name: Save Consent
details: Required, your consent needs to be saved. If you deny all, you will get this popup each time you visit this website.

name: Page Setting
details: Used to save your theme and guide page progression.

name: Last Login
details: Saves settings of your last successful FTP connection (without password). Used to fill in data faster.

name: Tab Connections
details: Saves your connection key in your 'tab storage'. Boosts performace by preventing reconnection to FTP server on each action.

name: Session Connections
details: Saves your connection key in a session cookie too, allowing your connections to be saved even if you close the tab, but not if you close the browser. Needs 'Tab Connections' to work.

name: Authenticaion Token
details: Saves a unique login token to a permanent cookie. Required for authentication.
